description: Expansion of susceptibility series related to Potts model.
references: R. V. Ditzian and L. P. Kadanoff, Series studies of the four-state Potts model, J. Phys. A 12 (1979), L229-L233.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _Simon Plouffe_
